summary: Test suite that verifies the functionality and robustness of the I2VGenXL video generation pipeline, covering core operations, attention mechanisms, output formats, batch processing consistency, hardware offloading, component serialization, and compatibility with alternative attention implementations, along with comprehensive integration tests.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable and high‑quality video generation for downstream applications by detecting regressions, ensuring compatibility with various hardware and attention configurations, and validating end‑to‑end pipeline behavior before release.
